# Caleb Kwon 

I'm a 3rd year PhD Candidate in Operations Management at Harvard University. 

My dissertation explores the associations between managerial talent, labor scheduling decisions, and firm performance. Please see the [Research](https://calebkwon.com/research.html) tab for my papers. My dissertation committee consists of Professors [Ananth Raman](https://www.hbs.edu/faculty/Pages/profile.aspx?facId=6534) (Chairperson), [Antonio Moreno](https://www.hbs.edu/faculty/Pages/profile.aspx?facId=1029325), and [Jorge Tamayo](https://www.hbs.edu/faculty/Pages/profile.aspx?facId=1063486).  

Prior to Harvard, I received a B.A. in Economics from Simon Fraser University, and an M.A in Economics from Northwestern University.
